title: Do I need Power pro and lookout on my phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely you do not need Power Pro or any alleged power saving app on your phone but you need to go int your settings and optimize your apps to save power etc I do not know what phone you have so cannot walk you through what settings you need to enable to get the most from your battery but its all available in Android without the need for a power hungry app to save less than it uses .Personally I feel I do not need and do not use any antivirus or security apps. I have been downloading APKs and other risky stuff without ever getting a virus or malware for years. Nor have I been hacked or meet any one who has been hacked and that is with meeting hundreds of Android users. I am not the only person who believes this ever the link is to good info so worth a read. Here are 5 apps you should remove right now - AndroidPIT
